mapper.select: SELECT 'crew1' as crewNum ,DAYNAME(produce_date) AS proDate,SUM(material_total) DIV 100 AS prototal,produce_date FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(produce_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), 1) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1)-1 group by produce_date UNION ALL SELECT 'crew2' as crewNum,DAYNAME(produce_date) AS proDate ,SUM(material_total) DIV 100 AS prototal,produce_date FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(produce_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), 1) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1)-1 group by produce_date order by crewNum,produce_date

( SELECT produce_disc_num, material_total, produce_date, produce_time, produce_custom_num, '机组一' AS crew1 FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 4 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT produce_disc_num, material_total, produce_date, produce_time, produce_custom_num, '机组二' AS crew1 FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 4 )
